mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORG_USER_ROLE( ROLE_UID_, USER_UID_, ROLE_ID_, USER_ID_, ADD_NAME_, ADD_NAME_CN_, DOC_CREATED_ ) VALUES( #{roleUid ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addNameCn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docCreated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.delete: delete from ORG_USER_ROLE where ROLE_UID_ in (#{roleUids, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
delete from ORG_USER_ROLE where USER_UID_ in (#{userUids, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
